people.name: Giancarlo Pernudi Segura
people.description: Also known as gino, Giancarlo is a second year student in the Computer Science Specialization program. He's a hardcore linux (manjaro-i3) fan and vim enthusiast. Currently enrolled in the Canadian Armed Forces Reserves as an Army Communications and Information Systems Specialist. Besides his official responsibilities, he also maintains the club website, and github organization. He has also made all club graphic design objects such as logo's and posters. He likes watching sunsets and long walks on the beach.

people.name: Will Fenton
people.description: Will Fenton is a third year Computing Science student and Vice President of the UAIS. His AI interests include game AI, content generation, and artificial general intelligence. He is currently working on improving AI players for the game of Amazons, under Dr. Martin MÃ¼ller. He has some knowledge of regression, neural networks, reinforcement learning, and search.

people.name: Della Amira Humanita
people.description: Della is a third-year computing science student with broad interests in software development, psychology and game design. She is particularly interested in applications that aid people in learning. To recharge, she likes to knit and bake little snacks.

people.name: Nick Nissen
people.description: Runs his Tesla in vim mode.

people.name: Paul Saunders
people.description: Paul Saunders is a second year student in a Computing Science Specialization degree. He favours the data science aspect of AI and ML rather than games, and has been working with data since grade 11. He joined UAIS in its very first year and has since been working hard on explaining that AI probably will not take over the world, and he writes the newsletters for the club. He competes in olympic weightlifting, mountain bike races, and is generally a cool guy. He also tutors two math courses, and so along with Justin he is a great resource for any math or stats troubles you may have.

people.name: Justin Stevens
people.description: Justin is in his third year studying math and computing science after transferring from Harvey Mudd College. He founded the Undergraduate Artificial Intelligence Society in fall 2018 and is the current president. His primary interests are in reinforcement and machine learning, and he enjoys teaching other students about the magic behind AI.

people.name: Dylan Hanna
people.description: Dylan Hanna is a second year student double majoring in Psychology and Computing Science. When it comes to AI heâ€™s mainly interested in AI in gaming, but he is also interested in AI in therapy. Dylan is a beginner to AI whoâ€™s using it to beat and break games, so heâ€™s a great resource if youâ€™re also learning about AI from the ground up. In his spare time, heâ€™s a skateboarder, photographer, filmmaker, gamer, and long-distance runner, so overall heâ€™s a pretty cool guy.
